channel.title: Protein on KrolTech
channel.description: Recent content in Protein on KrolTech

item.title: Protein!, jQuery animation and easing, programming Android, Holiday party!!
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: My continued use of My Fitness Pal (nutrition tracking app) has veered dangerously close to obsession! Literally, it’s become something of a game. I’m constantly looking at the details on every food and considering how it will effect my “stats” (seriously, as if I’m an MMO character or something)! Ultimately, that’s a good thing I guess. This past weekend alone I’ve been doing REALLY really well with my eating. I have a great schedule of meals lined up for the week too, with high protein days stacked for Tuesday and Thursday (Crossfit days).
